meanings.definition: The position or office of a president.
meanings.sent1: During his presidentship, he made important decisions for the country.
meanings.sent2: The presidentship of the club rotates every year.
meanings.sent3: The presidentship of the student council comes with great responsibility.
meanings.sent4: She handled the presidentship with grace and dignity.
meanings.sent5: The presidentship is a symbol of leadership and authority.

meanings.definition: The term of office of a president.
meanings.sent1: His presidentship lasted for four years.
meanings.sent2: The presidentship of the company ends next month.
meanings.sent3: The presidentship of the class pet was short-lived.
meanings.sent5: The presidentship is a period of great responsibility and accountability.
